scripts.clean: echo '=> Cleaning' && rimraf ./dist && mkdir dist && for x in style script ; do mkdir dist/${x}; done
scripts.compile:html: echo '=> Compiling HTML' && jade ./src/html --out dist && echo 'HTML compiled'
scripts.compile:style: echo '=> Compiling CSS' && stylus -u nib --sourcemap ./src/style/style.styl --out dist/style/style.css && echo 'CSS compiled'
scripts.compile:js: echo '=> Compiling Javscript' && browserify --extensions=.es6 src/script/app.es6 -t babelify | uglifyjs > dist/script/bundle.js && echo 'Javascript compiled'
scripts.compile: echo '=> Compiling' && for task in html style js; do npm run compile:${task}; done
